hints.content:
Let's rewrite each value in standard form:

$\purpleD{40{,}000+4{,}000} + \text\purpleD{ seven hundred one} =\purpleD{44{,}701}$

$\text{\tealE{44{,}701}}=\tealE{44{,}701}$

Now, we can use a place value chart to compare the numbers.

Ten Thousands| Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: |:-:
$\purpleD4$ | $\purpleD4$ | $\purpleD7$ | $\purpleD0$ | $\purpleD1$
$\tealE4$ | $\tealE4$ | $\tealE7$ | $\tealE0$ |$\tealE1$

question.content:
